item.title: Inno Handheld 1
item.description:
Inno Handheld: Smart Sensor for Plant Nitrogen Monitoring

The Inno Handheld is a portable device designed for rapid, non-destructive assessment of leaf nitrogen concentration in crops. Developed by AgrAInno, this device combines advanced spectral sensing with a user-friendly design, enabling farmers and researchers to collect accurate nitrogen data in the field within seconds.

item.title: Inno Handheld 2.0
item.description:
Inno Handheld 2.0: Bluetooth-Enabled Smart Sensor for Plant Nutrition

The Inno Handheld 2.0 is the next-generation portable sensor developed by AgrAInno for accurate, non-destructive nitrogen concentration measurement in crops. Equipped with Bluetooth connectivity, this device seamlessly pairs with mobile apps to provide real-time nitrogen data in the field.

item.title: Satellite Data Service
item.description:
Satellite-Based Crop Nutrition Monitoring

AgrAInno’s Satellite Data Service provides field-scale insights into crop health, nitrogen status, and stress levels through high-resolution multispectral imagery. Using Sentinel-2 data, our platform delivers timely, cloud-based diagnostics that help farmers and agronomists optimize input use and improve crop performance.

item.title: The AI-Enhanced Satellite & Sensor Integration
item.description:
Integrated Satellite & Inno Sensor Mapping

AgrAInno’s integrated service platform combines high-resolution satellite data with ground-truth measurements from Inno Handheld sensors. This dual-source approach enables accurate detection of crop nitrogen levels and early identification of water stress zones—empowering smarter nutrient and irrigation management.

item.title: UAV Health Mapping
item.description:
UAV-Based Crop Nutrition and Stress Mapping

AgrAInno’s UAV Health Mapping service offers an advanced solution for monitoring crop nutrition and detecting stress at the field scale. Using drones equipped with multispectral sensors, we collect high-resolution imagery that is enhanced with super-resolution models to produce detailed vegetation indices and nutrient status maps.

item.title: UAV Weed Mapping
item.description:
UAV-Based Weed Detection and Mapping

AgrAInno provides cutting-edge drone-based weed mapping solutions to support precision weed management in agriculture. By integrating high-resolution RGB and multispectral imagery with advanced AI models, we generate detailed weed distribution maps that help optimize herbicide applications and improve crop productivity.
